name: Mistral Ventures
overview:
Mistral Ventures, Inc. does not have significant operations. The company intends to identify and acquire an alternative business opportunity. Previously, it was engaged in the acquisition and exploration of natural resource properties. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.

Mistral Ventures, Inc. engages in the development of mobile phone applications for mobile marketplaces. It develops iPhone and iPod Touch applications for client customers. It also develops software for personal computers, including Windows and Mac operating systems. The company distributes its products through in-house sales people. Mistral Ventures, Inc. was founded in 2005 and is based in Vancouver.

acquisitions.source_description: Mistral Ventures, Inc. Signs LOI to Acquire Assets of Tech World Capital, Inc.
